name: Globant
role: Obtaining project requirements from the client, formulating the requirements, assigning tasks to team members, and tracking the progress
Contributor to maintain and extend Globant’s association with its client
Working on developing a vivid range of Android apps
Conduct knowledge sharing sessions and tech talks at Globant-India
Continuously focused on improvements in technical/non-technical skills

projects.name: FCV (Android Application)
projects.project_description: This application is designed for the user to easily manage their Debit/Credit cards. This application provides features like Add multiple cards, Lock/Unlock a card, View/Manage transactions, Control where a card can and cannot be used and many more.
role_and_responsibilities: Role and Responsibilities in the project:

projects.name: LocationAlert (Android Auto Application)
projects.project_description: This application is compatible with your car dashboard console which uses Android Auto App features. It’s a simple application to notify you on the go when you are nearby your desired location.
role_and_responsibilities: Role and Responsibilities in the project:

projects.name: Let’s Go (Carpool Application)
projects.project_description: It’s a simple application to minimize the traffic problem using the concept of carpooling. The application has basic features like booking a ride, posting a ride, monitoring upcoming/ongoing rides and many more.
